message: Let's start with a fair and square 50/50 split, Bob.
I understand you want to be fair Alice, but consider the inflation.  This offer gives me a little extra to compensate.
Bob, the inflation is working against you, not me. I'm willing to be slightly more generous this time, but this is my final offer.
Alice, inflation is hurting me, but holding out any longer will hurt us both. Let's take the fair deal and end this.
